attributes.action: Build More Ice Rinks in Local areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think this would be a good idea because it would decrease the number of youths hanging around the streets and it would bring jobs to the local communities.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Build More Ice Rinks in Local areas."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15112.asp

Prime Minister's Office
